VARIABLES.foodDescription:
A traditional dish made 
of stuffed vegetables.
VARIABLES.endMsg1: I entered cryoconservation after all kurdish schools were shut.
VARIABLES.endMsg2:
Speaking my language 
was criminalized. 
My future vanished.

VARIABLES.foodDescription:
A staple dish made 
from steamed semolina grains.
VARIABLES.endMsg1:
I entered cryoconservation 
when my alphabet, 
the Tifinagh, was banned.
VARIABLES.endMsg2:
I refused to live 
where my soul was treated 
as a foreign shadow.

VARIABLES.foodDescription:
A traditional Maori method of cooking food using heated rocks buried 
in a pit oven.
VARIABLES.endMsg1: I chose the deep sleep when our ancestral lands were seized.
VARIABLES.endMsg2:
I am waiting for a world where the spirit 
of the Whakapapa 
is respected again.

VARIABLES.foodDescription: A traditional Palestinian dish made with rice, meat, and fried vegetables.
VARIABLES.endMsg1:
Now that olive groves 
are uprooted and my keys 
no longer fit any door.
VARIABLES.endMsg2:
I am preserved 
until the map remembers my name and the borders 
turn to dust.

VARIABLES.foodDescription: A traditional Uyghur dish made with hand-pulled noodles and stir-fried vegetables and meat.
VARIABLES.endMsg1:
When the mosques were torn down, my brothers disappeared 
into the camps.
VARIABLES.endMsg2:
I am holding my breath until my culture 
is no longer a crime.

VARIABLES.foodDescription: A traditional Paraguayan dish made with cornmeal, cheese, and onions.
VARIABLES.endMsg1:
I went into the ice 
as the great forests fell 
and our sacred chants 
were drowned 
by machines.
VARIABLES.endMsg2:
I will only wake 
when the earth speaks 
the language 
of the spirits again.
